name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: [NOISE].

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: There are many more advanced learning algorithms than the regression based

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: reproaches.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: And they generally account to theoretically

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: optimize or retrieval method.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Like map or nDCG.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Note that the optimization objecting function that we have seen

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: on the previous slide is not directly related to retrieval measure.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Right?

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: By maximizing the prediction of one or zero.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Or we don't necessarily optimize the ranking of those documents.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _One can imagine that why
column6: our prediction may not be too bad and _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: let's say both are around 0.5.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: So it's kind of in the middle of zero and one for

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _the two documents
column6: but the ranking can be wrong. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _So we might have the

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: D2 and then e1.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _So that won't be good from retrieval perspective

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _even though by likelihood function

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _In contrast
column6: we might have another case where we predicted values. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _Or around 0.9 let's say

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _and by the objective function

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _can get the order of the two documents correct

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: So these new more advanced approaches will try to correct that problem.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Of course then the challenge is that.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: That the optimization problem will be harder to solve.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: And then researchers have proposed many solutions to the problem.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: And you can read more of the references at the end.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Know more about the these approaches.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Now these learning to random approaches.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _Are actually general
column6: so they can also be applied to many other ranking problems

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: not just retrieval problem.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _So here I list some for example recommender systems

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _computational adv

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: there are many others that you can probably encounter in your applications.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _To summarize this lecture

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: learning to combine much more features to incorporate a ranking without.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _Actually the use of machine learning

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: in information retrieval has started since many decades ago.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: So for example on the Rocchio feedback approach that we talked about earlier

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _was a machine learning approach applied to to learn this feedback

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: the most reasonable use of machine learning has been driven by some changes.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: In the environment of applications of retrieval systems.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _And first it's

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: driven by the availability of a lot of training data in the form of clicks rules.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Such data weren't available before.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: So the data can provide a lot of useful knowledge about

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: relevance and machine learning methods can be applied to leverage this.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Secondly it's also due by the need of combining them.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: In the features. And

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: this is not only just because there are more features available on the web

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: that can be naturally re-used with improved scoring.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _It's also because by combining them
column6: we can improve the robustness of ranking. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: So this is designed for combating spams.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Modern search engines all use some kind of machine learning techniques to combine

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: many features to optimize ranking and

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _this is a major feature of these current engines such as Google

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: The topic of learning to rank is still active research.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _Topic in the community
column6: and so you can expect to see new results being developed

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: _in the next

name: 5 - 8 - 4.4 Learning to Rank - Part 3 (00-04-58).srt
text: Perhaps.
